Articles.Content: Is there any type of release date yet for consoles? We're currently running a broken version of ksp and we'd like to catch up to PC and macs features as well. Thanks.

Hello, and welcome to the forums! 

6 minutes ago, kageibukiindustries said:

Is there any type of release date yet for consoles?

Nope, and there won't be.  Squad never announces release dates in advance, for PC or console.  The way you'll know when the release is coming will be when they say "Hey everyone, we released it!" 

Your best bet for news and status is to just follow the "KSP Weekly" posts that they publish every Friday over on The Daily Kerbal.  They usually mention something about how things are coming along, what they're working on, etc.  But just to set expectations appropriately:  you won't get any release dates there.
